General Buffer





Improved Combat Lv 1
Increases P. Att. and P.Def. by 15%
Improved Condition Lv 1
Increases Max HP and MP by 35%
Improved Magic Lv 1
Increases M. Att. and M. Def.
Improved Shield Defence Lv 1
Increases shield defence
Improved Movement Lv 1
Increases speed and evasion
Improved Critical Attack Lv 1
Increases critical rate and damage
Chant of Blood Awakening Lv 1
Increases Atk.Spd by 33% & drain 9%
Concentration Lv 6
Decrases magic cancel dmg. by 53
Acumen Lv 3
Increases Casting Spd. by 30%
Wild Magic Lv 2
Increases magic dmg rate by 2
Clarity Lv 3
Decreases MP consumption

A powerful spirit acts
